Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

add(item : T, ?pos : Int) : T

parameters
item
pos default-value: -1
returns
item
Method will add the item on the given position. It will add the item at the end of the childlist when the value is equal to -1.

indexOf(item : T) : Int

inherited from prime.bindable.collections.IReadOnlyList
parameters
item
returns
position of the requested item
Method will return the index of the requested item or -1 of the item is not in the list.

move(item : T, newPos : Int, ?curPos : Int) : T

parameters
item
newPos
curPos Optional parameter that can be used to speed up the moving process since the list doesn't have to search for the original location of the item.
returns
item
Method will change the depth of the given item.

remove(item : T, ?oldPos : Int) : T

parameters
item
returns
item
Method will try to remove the given item from the childlist.
